Configuration.Name: L1=L2=12m_central_apx10_new
Configuration.SetupScript:
config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 11200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g2' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 1 config.beamcenterx = 92.13 config.beamcenterz = 94.58
config.drive()
